channel.title: Wait?

item.title: Wait?
item.dc:creator: @legitscape legitscape
item.description:
@legitscape wrote:

I have this for fishing:

	private int objectID;
	public void reFish() {
	setAnimation(618);
	fish(317);
	actionInterval = 3000;
	lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
	}

How can I make it wait 3 seconds before it catches the fish, and them stops the emote? Thanks

Read full topic
